projects.name: BoldContacts mobile app
projects.description: BoldContacts is a mobile app for people with disabilities and for their carers. It's especially useful for people who are starting to experience vision disabilities, cognitive disabilities, motor disabilities, Alzheimer's Disease, Parkinson's Disease, Multiple Sclerosis (MS), Amyotrophic Lateral Sclerosis (ALS), and similar conditions.
